title: Goa Trip
description: Visited Goa with friends. Beach fun, local food, and nightlife were amazing!

description: Graduated with a degree in Computer Science. A proud moment for me and my family.

title: First Hackathon
description: Participated in a 24-hour hackathon and won second place.

title: Started Freelancing
description: Began working as a freelance web developer during the pandemic.

description: Went trekking in the Himalayas with college friends. Stunning views!

description: Started a personal tech blog to share knowledge and experiences.

title: Rakhi Celebration
description: Celebrated Raksha Bandhan with my sister. Tied rakhi, exchanged gifts, and shared sweets.
